metadata.subject: Strange Bedfellows: Culture, Meet Science/Science, Meet Culture

relationships.description: Krauss runs the Origins Project at Arizona State University
Krauss and directorial team produced the documentary The Unbelievers

analysis.purpose: To propose a television series pairing cultural icons with scientists for moderated discussions
analysis.significance: Detailed proposal for a high-profile series featuring celebrities and Nobel laureates in cross-disciplinary dialogues

notable_quotes: "bring together cultural icons, celebrities, movie stars, directors, writers and musicians with famous scientists to talk about commonalities and differences"
"over 3000 people would regularly attend live, and up to 500,000 people would watch the recorded events"

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed or referenced

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be an internal proposal document for a television series featuring high-profile individuals

analysis.summary: This document outlines a proposed television series called 'Strange Bedfellows' that would pair cultural celebrities with prominent scientists for moderated discussions, to be produced by Lawrence Krauss and filmed in various international locations featuring notable figures including Johnny Depp, Woody Allen, Barack Obama, and multiple Nobel laureates.
